what are the symptoms you have?
what do you feel?

Avoid crowds, and use masks to prevent infection.
Attention to hygiene in general.
Keep away from places with high humidity.
Wash hands well.
Avoid touching the eyes,nose,or mouth before washing hands.
Not to deal directly or indirectly with people infected with the virus

Stay home and only go to hospital to get medical care.
Avoid using public transportation.
Stay isolated in one room away from family members and others.
Eat in your room,Open windows to keep air circulating.
Use a separate bathroom if you can.
When sitting with others in one place,reduce your range of motion.
Stay 6 feet (2 meters) away from family members.
Clean the most touchable surfaces in your separate room and bathroom.
Avoid sharing personal household items.

Keep your hands clean and make sure they don't touch your face.
Wear a mask. If you have to be in the same room with the sick person.
You must stay at least 6 feet (2 meters) away from the sick person.
If your mask gets wet or dirty, replace it with another one.
Use sprays of household cleaners or wet wipes to clean more touchable surfaces
Avoid cleaning the sick person's room and bathroom.
Allocate a set of mattresses and utensils for the sick person to use alone.
Avoid receiving visitors until the sick person recovers
